Entry.JapaneseText: どうして、ピピスタには ヒューマがいないんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Why are there no Huma here in Pipista?

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ、ここは、もとから ガジュマだけが暮らす村だったそうだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... From what I understand, since its founding, the only people who've inhabited this village were Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: この辺りの環境は、ヒューマが暮らすには 少々厳しいものがある……
Entry.EnglishText: The environment here is more or less too rugged for Huma to live in.

Entry.JapaneseText: 対立や争いではなく、自然な形として、 この村はこうなったというわけだな。
Entry.EnglishText: So the village is like this, not because of any conflict or fighting, but because it came about naturally.

Entry.JapaneseText: なるほど……種族の違いってのは、 悪いほうにばっかり出るわけじゃないんだな。
Entry.EnglishText: I see... So I guess having differences between the races isn't always a bad thing.
